description:
The event will take place on 22nd of May at UPTEC conference room.
The event will be in Portuguese, however based on your feedback the next ones can be done in English.

## Agenda

18h30 - Official start and networking

18h50 - Short introduction to PHPorto meetup by João Alves

19h00 - Laravel, PHP for Artisans by Francisco Carvalho

19h20 - Break

19h40 - TDD: Testar, Desenvolver, Duplicar by Carlos Dias

20h00 - Networking

## Talks Abstract

### Laravel, PHP for Artisans by Francisco Carvalho

Laravel is a PHP application framework with expressive and elegant syntax, that attempts to take the pain out of development by easing common tasks used in the majority of web projects, such as authentication, routing, sessions, and caching.
Laravel is accessible, yet powerful, providing powerful tools needed for large, robust applications. A superb inversion of control container, expressive migration system, and tightly integrated unit testing support give you the tools you need to build any application with which you are tasked.

### TDD: Testar, Desenvolver, Duplicar by Carlos Dias

Short introduction to TDD(Test driven design), showing how to do it and best practices.
name: PHPorto meetup - May 2018
